mapper.select: SELECT no, email, title, q_type qType, answer, reg_date regDate FROM q_question ORDER BY no
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM q_question WHERE no = #{ no }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO q_faq (no, title, content) VALUES (NEXTVAL('Q_FAQ_NO'), #{ title }, #{ content })
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM q_faq WHERE no = #{ no }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO q_notice (no, title, contents, notice_type) VALUES (NEXTVAL('Q_NOTICE_NO'), #{ title }, #{ contents }, #{ noticeType })
INSERT INTO q_notice_attach (no, notice_no, ori_name, saved_name, file_size) VALUES (NEXTVAL('Q_NOTICE_ATTACH_NO'), CURRVAL('Q_NOTICE_NO'), #{ oriName }, #{ savedName }, #{ fileSize })
mapper.update: UPDATE q_notice SET title = #{ title }, contents = #{ contents }, notice_type = #{ noticeType }, reg_date = NOW() WHERE no = #{ no }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM q_notice WHERE no = #{ no }
